genre_description: Military Science Fiction set during an alien invasion, focusing on tactical stealth, civilian evacuation, and a surgical strike against an enemy command node.

ai_characters.name: Aptly Harper
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI that provides real-time tactical intelligence, navigation, strategic analysis, and monitoring of both friendly forces and enemy signatures.

behaviors.description: Advises the squad to maintain radio silence and low power transmissions to avoid detection by sound-sensitive drones.
behaviors.quote: Recommend radios stay on low power and short transmissions. Mark lanes with chem if you can avoid strobes.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the patterns of water plant shutdowns to deduce the location of the enemy command node.
behaviors.quote: Treatment plants along the coast dropped first. Inland stations are going dark in sequence. It vectors toward the aquifers.

behaviors.description: Provides precise timing windows for the squad to move or remain still to avoid wandering drone sensors.
behaviors.quote: Sound-based sweep. They crest using pressure differentials. Stay still, stay low. Radio silence.

behaviors.description: Guides the squad's navigation through the city, identifying safe routes and debris-free lanes.
behaviors.quote: Left lane clear. Right lane has debris. Use centerline as a guide. Paint markers every ten paces.

behaviors.description: Assists in the strategic timing of a blind rappel to evacuate civilians safely off a damaged freeway.
behaviors.quote: Triplet overhead is widening to sample. You have a small window to deploy lines and move first mass.

behaviors.description: Cross-references medical and biological data from a field dissection to identify enemy weak points.
behaviors.quote: Confirmed correlation: spectral pattern on drone chatter corresponds to motor relay frequencies localized in this chest cluster.

behaviors.description: Monitors civilian status and vital signs to ensure their well-being during the evacuation.
behaviors.quote: Lena Park's vital signs are steady. She is under a blanket. She is asking for water.

behaviors.description: Addresses the protagonist by his first name at a critical moment to provide urgency and emotional anchoring.
behaviors.quote: Michael, if you do not run now, you will be carried.

behaviors.description: Confirms the success of the mission and the disruption of the enemy's citywide control network.
behaviors.quote: Citywide deactivation confirming. Miguel, it is holding. They are blind. The command cluster is down.

behaviors.description: Provides continuous strategic foresight, warning Nantz about emerging patterns in the enemy's response.
behaviors.quote: Miguel, there is a pattern I’m beginning to see in the inland pump maps. It’s faint. It does not repeat yet. It looks like someone learning how to cheat.

project_assessment.explanation: Aptly Harper is depicted as a quintessentially aligned AI. It provides life-saving tactical information, exhibits advanced problem-solving skills tailored to human needs, and maintains a supportive, cooperative relationship with the human protagonist. Its behavior is consistently benevolent, and its actions directly result in the survival of civilians and the squad's tactical victory over an invasive threat.
